page.title: 10THE PARISH OF YANWORTH TODAY
page.content: { St.Michael & All Angels}-electoral roll 17- is in the Northleach deanery. As elsewhere falling attendances has meant joining parishes but in rural areas the population is also falling. Although only {one service} is held alternate Sundays, Yanworth is one of a group of local parishes that realise the church must change with the times. Seeing the problem of housebound old people the local churches started a{day centre}at Chedworth 3 kms. away. Here opportunities for craft sessions and a good meal are provided once a week and some of Yanworth's older residents, helped by their volunteer drivers, enjoy this facility. Although the churches still give active help, the increasing numbers has meant it having to be run independently. Yanworth has a{bible study group and joins in the deanery activities.
